description: darker brown wood than most; brass at end of barrel tooled in a V pattern; star with flowery silver inlay on PL of stock; "C. E. S." engraved in silver inlay on neck, "J. D. Laubach at Wmsbg 1977" engraved on top of barrel
title: Virginia-style (Shenandoah Valley, 1700s) Flintlock Longrifle
